ideal_summary: Services Australia's Paid Parental Leave gives eligible working birth or adoptive parents up to 18 weeks of Parental Leave Pay while they are the child's primary carer.

expected_facts.fact: Paid Parental Leave provides up to 18 weeks of Parental Leave Pay
You must have worked at least 10 months in the 13 months before the birth or adoption to meet the work test

disallowed_facts.fact: Paid Parental Leave requires 12 months of continuous employment

ideal_summary: Medicare cards let you access subsidised healthcare and you can order a replacement card online, in the Express Plus Medicare app or by calling Medicare.

expected_facts.fact: Medicare provides access to subsidised healthcare
You can get a replacement Medicare card using your Medicare online account, the Express Plus Medicare mobile app or by calling Medicare

disallowed_facts.fact: Medicare charges a fee to issue or replace a card

ideal_summary: JobSeeker Payment is income support for Australians who are looking for work or temporarily unable to work while they meet mutual obligation requirements.

expected_facts.fact: JobSeeker Payment is available to people who are looking for work or are temporarily unable to work
match_phrases: if you are looking for work

expected_facts.fact: You usually need to meet mutual obligation requirements such as reporting income and attending appointments

disallowed_facts.fact: JobSeeker Payment is for full-time students
